content.TLDR: Running a conference is hard. But if you've got a good team, and if you care about what you're doing, then it can also be super-rewarding. Probably. Ask me in August.
content.abstract: Running a conference is hard. But if you've got a good team, and if you care about what you're doing, then it can also be super-rewarding. Probably. Ask me in August.
content.title: How to run a conference
